die-die-die-die.name: Die Die Die... Die
die-die-die-die.description: Kill 4 enemies with a single use of Reaper's Death Blossom in Quick or Competitive Play.

centenary.name: Centenary
centenary.description: Win 100 games in Quick or Competitive Play.

slice-and-dice.name: Slice and Dice
slice-and-dice.description: Kill 4 enemies with a single use of Genji's Dragonblade in Quick or Competitive Play.

undying.name: Undying
undying.description: Get a 20 player kill streak in Quick or Competitive Play.

the-path-is-closed.name: The Path Is Closed
the-path-is-closed.description: Destroy 3 of Symmetra's Teleporters in a single Quick or Competitive Play game.

survival-expert.name: Survival Expert
survival-expert.description: Use health packs to heal 900 health in a single life in Quick or Competitive Play.

decorated.name: Decorated
decorated.description: Earn 50 postgame medals in Quick or Competitive Play.

blackjack.name: Blackjack
blackjack.description: Earn 21 postgame cards in Quick or Competitive Play.

decked-out.name: Decked Out
decked-out.description: Collect 50 unlocks for a single hero.

their-own-worst-enemy.name: Their Own Worst Enemy
their-own-worst-enemy.description: Kill 2 enemies with a single use of Genji's Deflection in Quick or Competitive Play.

waste-not-want-not.name: Waste Not, Want Not
waste-not-want-not.description: Get 3 solo kills with a single clip of Reaper's shotguns in Quick or Competitive Play.

whoa-there.name: Whoa There!
whoa-there.description: Interrupt an enemy ultimate ability with McCree's Flashbang in Quick or Competitive Play.

its-high-noon.name: It's High Noon
its-high-noon.description: Get 4 killing blows with a single use of McCree's Deadeye in Quick or Competitive Play.

death-from-above.name: Death From Above
death-from-above.description: Kill 4 enemies in a row without touching the ground as Pharah in Quick or Competitive Play.

clearing-the-area.name: Clearing the Area
clearing-the-area.description: Knock an enemy to their death using Pharah's Concussive Blast in Quick or Competitive Play.

rocket-man.name: Rocket Man
rocket-man.description: Get 2 killing blows with a single use of Soldier: 76's Helix Rockets in Quick or Competitive Play.

target-rich-environment.name: Target Rich Environment
target-rich-environment.description: Kill 4 enemies with a single use of Soldier: 76's Tactical Visor in Quick or Competitive Play.

total-recall.name: Total Recall
total-recall.description: Recover 400 health using Tracer's Recall without dying in Quick or Competitive Play.

special-delivery.name: Special Delivery
special-delivery.description: Stick 4 of Tracer's Pulse Bombs onto enemies in a single Quick or Competitive Play game.

triple-threat.name: Triple Threat
triple-threat.description: Kill 2 enemies in each of Bastion's configurations without dying in Quick or Competitive Play.

charge.name: Charge!
charge.description: Kill 4 enemies with a single use of Bastion's Configuration: Tank in Quick or Competitive Play.

simple-geometry.name: Simple Geometry
simple-geometry.description: Get 2 killing blows with a single use of Hanzo's Scatter Arrow in Quick or Competitive Play.

the-dragon-is-sated.name: The Dragon Is Sated

mine-like-a-steel-trap.name: Mine Like a Steel Trap
mine-like-a-steel-trap.description: Knock an enemy into your Steel Trap using Junkrat's Concussion Mine in Quick or Competitive Play.

roadkill.name: Roadkill
roadkill.description: Kill 4 enemies with a single use of Junkrat's RIP-Tire in Quick or Competitive Play.

ice-blocked.name: Ice Blocked
ice-blocked.description: Block 1200 damage with a single use of Mei's Ice Wall in Quick or Competitive Play.

cold-snap.name: Cold Snap
cold-snap.description: Freeze 4 enemies at once with Mei in Quick or Competitive Play.

raid-wipe.name: Raid Wipe
raid-wipe.description: Kill 4 enemies during a single use of Torbjörn's Molten Core in Quick or Competitive Play.

armor-up.name: Armor Up!
armor-up.description: Have one of Torbjörn's Armor Packs on 5 allies at the same time in Quick or Competitive Play.

did-that-sting.name: Did That Sting?
did-that-sting.description: Kill 4 enemies using Widowmaker's Venom Mine during a single Quick or Competitive Play game.

smooth-as-silk.name: Smooth as Silk
smooth-as-silk.description: Kill an enemy with a scoped headshot while airborne as Widowmaker in Quick or Competitive Play.

shot-down.name: Shot Down
shot-down.description: Prevent 1500 damage with a single use of D.va's Defense Matrix in Quick or Competitive Play.

game-over.name: Game Over
game-over.description: Kill 4 enemies with a single use of D.va's Self Destruct in Quick or Competitive Play.

i-am-your-shield.name: I Am Your Shield

storm-earth-and-fire.name: Storm, Earth and Fire

giving-you-the-hook.name: Giving You the Hook

hog-wild.description: Knock 2 enemies to their deaths with one use of Roadhog's Whole Hog in Quick or Competitive Play.

the-power-of-attraction.name: The Power of Attraction

the-floor-is-lava.name: The Floor Is Lava

supersonic.name: Supersonic

group-health-plan.name: Group Health Plan
group-health-plan.description: Restore 200 health for 5 players without dying as Mercy in Quick or Competitive Play.

huge-rez.name: Huge Rez

the-car-wash.name: The Car Wash

huge-success.name: Huge Success
huge-success.description: Teleport 20 players in a single Quick or Competitive Play game as Symmetra.

rapid-discord.name: Rapid Discord

the-iris-embraces-you.name: The Iris Embraces You

lockdown.name: Lockdown
lockdown.description: Win a Capture map on defense without losing the first objective in Quick or Competitive Play.

double-cap.description: Capture both objectives on a Capture map without dying in Quick or Competitive Play.

escort-duty.name: Escort Duty
escort-duty.description: Push a payload 100 meters without leaving it in Quick or Competitive Play.

cant-touch-this.name: Can't Touch This
cant-touch-this.description: Prevent the attacking team from touching the payload for 1 minute in Quick or Competitive Play.

shutout.name: Shutout
shutout.description: Win a Control map without the enemy capturing an objective in Quick or Competitive Play.

world-traveler.name: World Traveler
world-traveler.description: Win a Quick or Competitive Play game on 12 different maps.

the-friend-zone.name: The Friend Zone
the-friend-zone.description: Play a Quick or Competitive Play game in a group with a friend.

naptime.name: Naptime
naptime.description: Interrupt an enemy ultimate ability with Ana's Sleep Dart in Quick or Competitive Play.

enabler.name: Enabler
enabler.description: Get 4 kills or assists with a single use of Ana's Nano Boost in Quick or Competitive Play.

survived-the-night.name: Survived the Night
survived-the-night.description: Win Junkenstein's Revenge on Hard difficulty.

not-a-scratch.name: Not a Scratch
not-a-scratch.description: Win Junkenstein's Revenge on Hard difficulty with no damage to the door.

four-they-were.name: Four They Were
four-they-were.description: Win Junkenstein's Revenge using each of the 4 heroes.

held-the-door.name: Held The Door
held-the-door.description: Win Junkenstein's Revenge on Legendary difficulty.

hack-the-planet.name: Hack the Planet
hack-the-planet.description: Hack 15 enemies without dying as Sombra in Quick or Competitive Play.

power-outage.name: Power Outage
power-outage.description: Hack 6 enemies at once as Sombra in Quick or Competitive Play.

snowed-in.name: Snowed In
snowed-in.description: Win Mei's Snowball Offensive without losing a round.

cool-as-ice.name: Cool As Ice
cool-as-ice.description: Kill 4 enemies without missing in Mei's Snowball Offensive.

whap.name: Whap!
whap.description: Kill an enemy with a snowball from 25 meters away in Mei's Snowball Offensive.

ambush.name: Ambush!
ambush.description: Kill 3 enemies while they are picking up snow in a game of Mei's Snowball Offensive.

flagbearer.name: Flagbearer
flagbearer.description: Win Capture the Rooster with a score of 3 to 0.

cleanup-duty.name: Cleanup Duty

halt-state.name: Halt State
halt-state.description: Pull enemies into 1000 damage with a single use of Orisa's Halt! in Quick or Competitive Play.

overclocked.name: Overclocked

handle-with-care.name: Handle With Care
handle-with-care.description: Deliver the payload with over 80% health in Uprising on Hard difficulty.

strike-team.name: Strike Team
strike-team.description: Complete Uprising with each of the 4 heroes.

replacements.name: Replacements
replacements.description: Complete Uprising (All Heroes) with 8 different heroes.

air-strike.name: Air Strike
air-strike.description: Get a killing blow with Doomfist's full-power Seismic Slam in Quick or Competitive Play.

cratered.name: Cratered
cratered.description: Hit 6 enemies with a single use of Doomfist's Meteor Strike in Quick or Competitive Play.

volley.name: Volley
volley.description: Score a goal in Lúcioball with a shot taken from at least 4 meters in the air.

safe-hands.name: Safe Hands
safe-hands.description: Score 3 saves in a row in Lúcioball.

lucio-hat-trick.name: Lúcio Hat Trick
lucio-hat-trick.description: Score a goal, a save, and an assist in a game of Lúcioball.
